title: The Book Keeper
description: The book is writing itself as we speak....A mysterious book appears and must be returned to the Keeper. As boy meets girl to exchange the aged leather embossed book, their destinies are sealed. But she holds a secret that will change his life, and his secret will end hers.... Enjoy a bonus sneak peek of Embodiment at the end of The Book Keeper...
author: Julieann Wallace
